comment.author: 64848937@N00
comment._content: The obelix is a reminder of the Battle of the Boyne, the most important skirmish that has taken place on Irish soil.  Today there is a visitor centre and people of all political persuasions are welcome to celebrate or mourn the results of this bloody event.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
doctorbob:

Thanks for the additional details about this image. We will expand the description!

comment.author: 59207452@N05
comment._content: wasn't the obelix built before the battle????

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: The original obelisk, seen here, built as a monument to the battle, was later destroyed. There is a movement to build a new one: www.grandorangelodge.co.uk/press/PressReleases-2009/09052...
